entities.name: arry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is transported by a Portkey.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: A magical object that transports people from one place to another.

entities.name: tri-wizard cup
entities.description: A magical trophy awarded to the winner of a tournament.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: The other person that arry is clutching onto, who has died.

relationships.description: Portkey transported arry from one place to another.
